import React from 'react' import { Card, CardActions, CardContent, CardMedia, Button, Typography, ButtonBase } from '@mui/material'; import { ThumbUp, Delete, MoreHoriz } from "@mui/icons-material" import { useDispatch } from "react-redux" import { deletePost, likePost } from "../actions/Veri" import moment from "moment" import "moment/locale/tr" const Post = ({ post, setCurrentId }) => { const dispatch = useDispatch() return (
{post.creator} {moment(post.creator).fromNow()}
{post.tags.map(tag => `#${tag} `)} {post.title} {post.message}
) } export default Post
